website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, high-quality option that's a good alternative to PVC styles.
pros: Inflatable basketball set is brightly colored
Users appreciate the lightweight fabric construction
Stands out for being fun for all ages
cons: Ball tends to have issues with leaking air

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Great price! Will def buy again whenever this one dies.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this expecting it to last a couple weeks for the price I paid. It’s lasted all summer and taken a beating with 6 kids all summer long, with 4 of them being boys. The ball that comes with it is solid quality. The fabric seems to be pretty sturdy on the actual hoop frame. It hasn’t lost any shape. We have a rather large pool and the kids love shooting from the far end with success. We do not leave it floating in the pool or out in the sun. I think with proper care, it will last us into next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jlovely4

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was really weird about ordering one.. I’ve seen some before that are just junk.. this one is very sturdy and nice.. the ball is great and don’t soak up water! Definitely would buy again! I have 4 boys that are rough on things I’m sure it won’t last long!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Schmock

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool Toy At a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for our oldest son's family for their new pool. I just heard from the grandkids how much they are using it and enjoying it. I was thinking that for the price, it would be typical pool toy construction, but was pleased to see that it was nicely made of a nice fabric material. We are very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: J. Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: I really feel like I am in the NBA with this one
customer_reviews.text: Ok let's be real here.... I didn't buy this for a kid.... I bought this so I can constantly dunk over my girlfriend while she tries to do her pool exercises & it fulfills all of my expectations. As a white man, I really feel like I am in the NBA with this one. I wanted to review this item before my girlfriend did because I would expect her to give it a 1 star review because she feels this hoop condones such actions. P.S. This hoop is so real that Kevin Durant called me before he signed with Golden State.
customer_reviews.author: GgAcE

customer_reviews.title: Not the cheap crap you get from WalMart
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Not the cheap crap you get from WalMart. The plastic ring around the bottom helps to stabilize it so it actually stays upright the way it should instead of tipping over with the slightest wave.
customer_reviews.author: Iowa Army Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good value, great fun basketball set
customer_reviews.text: Bought another set as a housewarming gift for a new pool owner. These basketball sets are nice. Thick vinyl covering over most of the inflatable parts, except for the three “poles” holding up the hoop. (If they could cover the whole thing in a wrap that would make it even better.). The ball is ok. Recommend always storing it out of sunlight, not in the water when finished playing for maximum life—the sun and chlorine takes a toll on the rubber ball. Other than that, great value, good durability, lots of pool fun.
customer_reviews.author: ElPrimero

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun in the pool
customer_reviews.text: This hoop is extremely fun and crafted for rough play. It has taken a beating and still looking great! It takes a little longer to pop back in place after dunking the heck out of it but still working great. The basketball is flimsy but you won't be dribbling it so it's ok and can be easily replaced. Perfect size for the kids to play. We keep our cover when not using it because the sun and chlorine will definitely mess it up after some time. If it breaks now I still think its worth it and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Babilonia

customer_reviews.title: The ball is useless....arrived flatten & won’t inflate
customer_reviews.text: My son’s old pool hoop toy went to pots, after four years of sun and chlorine. I decided to buy this, as it appeared similar. Fortunately, I kept my ball from the other hoop, because the ball in this ser in worthless. It arrived flattened and all creased up. I attempted to inflate it with a hand held pump we already had, but it would not inflate. Hoop seems okay though. Just plan on finding another ball for the hoop!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: No Carrying Bag
customer_reviews.text: Good product but it said it came with a carrying bag which mine did not. I called Customer service they said they were out of stock and offered me 3 choices of kids games for my inconvenience which was nice but I would of prefer the bag as the basketball hoop stays out in the sun and is now wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 4th of July bbq and the kids and the family loved it. I wish there was another ball that came with it but other wise it was very sturdy and held up well with 8 kids and adults playing with it throughout the day. I would purchase again. Easy to blow up with pump.
customer_reviews.author: Ranson

customer_reviews.title: Toss in rubber ducks!
customer_reviews.text: I like the sturdy inflatable basketball hoop. The ball comes with a needle to inflate it, but you need a pump. I don’t have one, so the ball is useless. Kids are tossing in rubber ducks or anything that floats, until I can get a ball. The ad should state that!!
customer_reviews.author: roz

customer_reviews.title: Fun pool addition
customer_reviews.text: The hoop arrived quickly. It is very easy to inflate and set up. Lightweight enough to be moved in and out easily, yet just the right amount of stability to use for shooting baskets in the pool. It can also be stored conveniently. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Marian the Librarian

customer_reviews.title: re-gift for nephew
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing a PVC floatable that was never going to go together properly (seriously we had 4 adults, two of which are engineers trying to put this thing together) I ordered this as a replacement Christmas gift for my nephew. 3 boys from 4-11 were jumping and dunking all over this thing in and out of the lake for a week straight and it's still in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Semmler

customer_reviews.title: Good pool toy for the kids
customer_reviews.text: I have a nearly 4 year old and nearly 10 year old. Both ages love playing with it. However, it's a cheapish weakish sorry excuse for a basketball hoop. It is a good family fun pool toy however. Just don't have high expectations. It does the job and it's reasonably priced. Again, cheaper than buying from local pool store hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Joshl74

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Love the fabric over the inflatable ring. This is not a cheap version- this looks great in the pool and is sturdy and easy to inflate. You should use a bike pump though for the ball. I’m so glad I didn’t buy the other versions/brand.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Kuhary

customer_reviews.title: Great pool toy
customer_reviews.text: Was used for 5 days in a pool during a family vacation and did not lose any air. The sides are sturdy and it floats well. Did not tip over while in use. Was used mostly by teenage boys who were pretty rough with it. I was looking for an action shot but I only had a pic that happened to show it on the side of the pool. Great pool toy!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Good for the most part
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy for the most part, but just know it is really light-weight. The ball will not hold air very well, so you will probably have to replace it. Other than that, it does well in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: JacobJordan

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the pool but try to find a ball (“COOP” brand) made of same material as net frame.
customer_reviews.text: More durable than it looks. Stays upright, easy to inflate but air seeps out over a couple of days. Ball included is right size but too heavy and not same quality material as net.
customer_reviews.author: SJS Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay inflated - too many holes.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a 2018 Christmas gift for my kiddo who loves the pool. 6 months later she opened a box anticipating to enjoy the game with her friends who came over only to find out this piece has so many little holes in it and does not hold the air for more than 5 minutes. Turns into a blue piece of cloth in the pool. :(
customer_reviews.author: scarlettgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great summer fun!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to hold up sturdier than more expensive hoops. We purchased this for a pool with teenagers and they enjoyed it. No backboard of course makes it more difficult and adds a little more fun. The ball also seemed pretty durable and was easily gripped. The kit includes a needle but not a pump for the ball so be sure to have one handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We received the net, inflated everything & the ball ripped at the seam on the first throw & the net will not stay inflated, on the first day of use. We either received a defective item or this product stinks.
customer_reviews.author: D. Onorati

customer_reviews.title: Would have been fun
customer_reviews.text: Would have been fun but arrived with a hole And I just left it at the pool. The kids tried to Keep blowing it up but it didn’t stay inflated by for a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Craig A. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Terrific water toy for all ages
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this we’ve bought several. The last one flew out of a boat by accident so we bought another one
customer_reviews.author: North Carolina.JHS

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Saw competing models had horrible reviews and were twice the money. So far this has been extremely sturdy and fun to play with! Well put together
customer_reviews.author: P. R.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun, but inflatable ball sucks
customer_reviews.text: This is just okay. I stays upright and does it's thing but the ball is crappy. It's all lopsided and shaped like an egg when you blow it up. So it's impossible to throw it straight. For the price it's great just plan on purchasing a different ball before playing. The actual hope you can blow up with your mouth or a pump. The ball needs one of those pumps that you use the skinny pin for.
customer_reviews.author: JennMac

customer_reviews.title: Fun pool toy for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Overall satisfied with this. It takes a beating in the pool and has held up so far. I like that the inflatable tubing is mostly covered by a layer of fabric so I'm hoping that will protect it from getting busted.
customer_reviews.author: JPS_80

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Kids.
customer_reviews.text: This was an easy game for the kids. The ball was easy to toss and is heavy enough to land in the hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Eskanwilly

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Super upset and disappointed!! I read the reviews before purchasing and they were great so I ordered it. It came with a football not a basketball and it had a huge gash in it. We still wanted the hoop and we were just going to use another ball. While blowing it up for the first time It had two holes in it. We used the patches but by the time we drove to the pool it was already deflated. It went right into the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great water toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for pool or lake! Easy to inflate and holds air perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: K. Angle

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: Its a cute lil extra for the pool, nothing exciting at all. My kids do not always use it, they got bored of this quickly. They prefer the pool basketball hoop (pro rebounder).
customer_reviews.author: Graham08

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: My teen boys love this and it has lasted with up to 4 teen boys in the pool! 👍🏼💯
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not terribly stable
customer_reviews.text: It’s flimsier than I had hoped. The weight of the ball is too heavy for the hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Nanci Janssen

customer_reviews.title: Blast from the past
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product that my children absolutely love. We had something like this growing up and I remember spending hours in the pool playing with it. My kids do the exact same thing and it keeps them entertained. Happy kids Happy MOM!
customer_reviews.author: Roseanna Robertson

customer_reviews.title: The adults loved it too!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 7 year old grandson, but when he took it to a relatives pool party, the adults were playing and loving it just ss much as he was! So it was a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Has lasted all summer so far nice fit the price point
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: High school boys played with friends for an hour, slamming and dunking
customer_reviews.author: Boni

customer_reviews.title: pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasant surprised at the sturdiness of this. Our kids have loved it. Hope it lasts all summer!
customer_reviews.author: Sweetnlow

customer_reviews.title: Deflated the next day🙄
customer_reviews.text: The day we received this, my kids were so excited they blew it up immediately! However, the next morning, it was already deflated!
customer_reviews.author: ALV

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Not Cheap plastic like some
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a similar bball blow up we'd had for years. It was hard to find one with the good cloth like quality. This one is close. We'll see if it hold up for 10 years like the last one did! So far so good. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Tingley

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold air.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and inflated it...not holding the air. Continually deflates.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B

customer_reviews.title: Kids liked it
customer_reviews.text: Kids enjoyed it. Though not sure if they enjoyed wearing it more than playing with it in the pool. Not great on a windy day.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Not ok
customer_reviews.text: nice for the pool never used it hole in it
customer_reviews.author: Joseph s milito sr

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve bought different hoops for our pool in the past and they’ve never held up for very long. We just received this a few weeks ago and it’s gotten a lot of use so far. I’m talking “birthday party with close to 20 rough and rowdy kids” kind of use. They were in it, on it and tossing it around. It survived that and still looks brand new. Excellent choice!
customer_reviews.author: Dwelling in Dartmouth

customer_reviews.title: Would not stand up
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty toy, but I had to return it. It would not stand up, leaned over bad.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Need a needle and pump! Sucked when i got it and couldn’t inflate the ball right away
customer_reviews.author: Merlyn Batista

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I had found others with aluminum fittings but this one works just as great for 1/4 of the price!
customer_reviews.author: j.kezima

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 10 minutes in pool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this basketball swim toy for my grandson's birthday. I found out later than return policy date that the hoop lasted 10 minutes in the pool. My son said no rough play just normal use and in 10 minutes the seam broke open and all the air let out. The area of tear could not be patched.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this, in and out of the pool! It’s a great set at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Regina S

customer_reviews.title: Product Wouldn’t Inflate.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and in original packaging. However, it would not inflate. I tried using the pump that it came with and blowing it up myself. I also tried on more than one occasion and asked my husband to try too. Product must have had a leak or faulty piece. Ended up just throwing it out.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis M Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Unfortunately we do not have room for a basketball goal on the side of the pool and this was a great substitute!
customer_reviews.author: Danyelle

customer_reviews.title: Ball arrived with holes in it
customer_reviews.text: Ball arrived with holes in it. The hoop net part seems fine. Haven’t been able to use it because we don’t have a ball.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Super durable!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old played with this all summer! Very durable for the money! Shipped quick!
customer_reviews.author: momof2cuties

customer_reviews.title: Fun at a Great value
customer_reviews.text: Just took this on vacation. The ball was on the cheaper side, but the net itself was absolutely great! Kids and parents both enjoyed it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for our pool
customer_reviews.text: Great addition for our pool. Our teens and their friends love it. Good size for younger kids and adults!
customer_reviews.author: Healing

customer_reviews.title: Good product and good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last summer and have 3 boys and all their friends over in the pool daily and its still floating. Doesn't fall over like some other basket ball goals do. Would. Definitely. Recommend .
customer_reviews.author: christi childers

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a hole in the hoop
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Coop hoop to replace a Coop that we had already. We just blew it up yesterday, and this morning, it was filled with water and deflated. Sadly, it is beyond the return date as we hadn't needed it immediately. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Annie G

customer_reviews.title: Best built pool toy I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality not the kind of thing you buy at Home Walmart... sturdy you can actually play a game with it
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: This is very well made and a nice alternative if you aren't ready to buy a more ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made and a nice alternative if you aren't ready to buy a more permanent hoop for your pool. I have twin 5 year old boys and they love it, they use it as a float also.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for backyard pool time with the kids. I reccomend getting a couple extra balls for more than 1 child homes. Would make a great gift for age 2-10 girl or boy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. High quality. We used a different ball which works better than the ball it came with b
customer_reviews.author: Chithta Phong Phanh

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball hoop for the pool!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!! Kids have a blast, I even enjoy playing it with them. Great price, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jesika

customer_reviews.title: Good Pool Toy!
customer_reviews.text: Good for the pool. However, the rings were uneven. It was no biggy since we are not NBA stars especially in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: LengaAJ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality easy to blow up.
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy for pool but need some skills and practice to make the hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Yoursilversister

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Durable and Priced Right
customer_reviews.text: We have had this product for a few weeks now and use it almost daily. It holds up to use by an 8 year old boy who likes to dunk the ball. It was easy to inflate, floats well, stays upright and holds air.
customer_reviews.author: Caressa Jade

customer_reviews.title: The ball had a hole but the hoop is great
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5 stars but...The ball had a hole in it when we opened the box. Unfortunately we already inflated the hoop. I went to Walmart to get a new ball. Overall, kids like the basketball hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, not flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons 11th birthday. I was pleasantly surprised at how well it's made. It is not your typical flimsy plastic, it is more fabric like and withstands the roughness of boys!
customer_reviews.author: Louis Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This basketball hoop is well-made and sturdy. It is a perfect size for my daughter’s above-the-ground pool, but would also be great for a full-sized pool. It is easy to put away when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: My nephews love it. It’s taken a beating but still in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: gb219

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Overall this has been a good purchase. So far it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Pilote

customer_reviews.title: Best pool toy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun. Good bday gift also. Second one we've bought.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great pool toy!!!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it and it's easy to transport. Very durable so far. It holds up to my two kids and they're pretty hard on it.
customer_reviews.author: maria r.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for pool hoops
customer_reviews.text: It's a fun for the pool. Big enough for all ages. Only thing I would say is its fully inflatable so it could spring a hole if you play to rough with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Summer must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Kids had so much fun with this!!! Very sturdy and easy to use!!! Perfect for summer fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: This our 2nd time purchasing as we dontbwant to go through summer without it. First one lasted multiple years. Our entire family enjoys.
customer_reviews.author: mason mckellips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So impressed with this that we bought a 2nd one for traveling to other pools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once for a pool party but everyone loved it! Will need a ball pump for the ball.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The ball is better than I thought I would get... so much fun with this

customer_reviews.text: I tried to blow up this pool toy and a seam busted almost immediately... I was so looking forward to my kids using this for the summer and am so disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot of fun in the pool and doesn't take up much room.

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and packaged well. Seems to be good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Has been great for three older boys and friends, big hit!!

customer_reviews.title: Happy Buyer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflate. Needle provided for ball. Nice pattern and color print. Enjoyed by both adults and children. Great purchase with tons of fun.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am anticipating delight and exciteMent from my grandson when he comes to visit!! How can you go wrong? Basketball & swimming!

customer_reviews.text: The box says instant fun, but I had to go buy a ball pump to use it.

customer_reviews.title: Family Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the pool basketball hoops we've tried, this one is by far my family's favorite!!

product_meta.title: COOP Hydro Spring Hoops , Design may vary
product_meta.description: Size:OrigianlThe Coop Hydro Spring Hoops is a floating basketball game set for the swimming pool! The floating net opens for instant action and easily closes for storage thanks to an inner spring in the base of the basket. The fabric covering on the goal features a brightly colored surfer-inspired pattern that kids and teens love. This fabric cover also adds durability to the inflation chambers. Each basketball set includes an inflatable basketball with a textured grip for non-slip performance. Great for pool parties, endless summer days, and vacations. Folds flat and compact into three circles – it’s the perfect swimming pool game for travel! Includes one floating net and one ball per set. Carry/storage bag included. Colors and styles may vary. Sold individually. For children age 5 and older.
feature_bullets: Brightly colored fabric-covered inflatable basketball set
Game springs open and close for instant playing
Twist-n-fold design for easy portability and storage
Recommended for ages 5 and up; Measures 24.4"L x 24.4"W x 20.47"H when inflated

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars741 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
